thread.title: Crazy in love: Pregnant Beyonce shows off baby bump on glamorous date night with Jay Z
thread.title_full: Crazy in love: Pregnant Beyonce shows off baby bump on glamorous date night with Jay Z - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Crazy in love: Pregnant Beyonce shows off baby bump on glamorous date night with Jay Z
text:
Crazy in love: Pregnant Beyonce shows off baby bump on glamorous date night with Jay Z The couple were partying at the Weinstein Company Pre-Oscars dinner Share Comments By James Draper 15:15, 26 FEB 2017 Updated 15:20, 26 FEB 2017 Celebs (Photo: Rex Features) celebs She was recently forced to cancel her eagerly-anticipated performance at Coachella music festival, but that hasn't stopped pregnant Beyonce Knowles from enjoying a glamorous date night with her equally-famous husband, Jay Z .
The pair were spotted indulging in a romantic evening out on Saturday, where they both appeared to be seriously loved-up.
Dressed to impress for each others' company, the pair were seen out-and-about in downtown Los Angeles where they attended the Weinstein Company Pre-Oscars dinner.
Clearly glowing as she enjoys her pregnancy, the Lemonade singer - who's expecting twins - was all smiles as she soaked up the festivities ahead of the Academy Awards.
Beyonce was glowing as she partied ahead of the Academy Awards (Photo: Rex Features) Beyonce and Jay Z put on a typically united displayon Saturday (Photo: Rex Features) Read More Celine Dion gives advice to Beyonce about having twins: ‘It’s going to be hectic!” Wearing a figure-hugging turquoise dress which showed off her bootylicious figure, the Destiny's Child performer parted her peroxide blonde hair in the middle for a classy aesthetic.
She also couldn't help but show off her increasingly-maternal figure, which is the source of much excitement for fans.
Meanwhile, Jay Z was just as dapper in his choice of attire - a jet-black suit with a camouflage-print dress shirt.
Together, the pair were the picture of happiness as they joined some of Hollywood's biggest stars for the annual celebrations.
Together, the pair were the picture of happiness as they joined some of Hollywood's biggest stars for the annual celebrations. (Photo: Rex Features) Beyonce was due to perform at Coachella, but recently had to cancel (Photo: Robyn Beck/AFP/Getty) The couple's latest outing comes just days after Beyonce pulled out of her performance at Coachella Valley Music & Arts Festival after being told by doctors to reduce her schedule during her pregnancy.
In a statement posted on the event's Facebook page, it was confirmed that she follow the advice and as such won't be headlining this year - but she will return for 2018.
Read More Beyonce shares picture of Blue with a Snapchat filter and fans freak out over her 'secret account' "Following the advice of her doctors to keep a less rigorous schedule in the coming months, Beyonce has made the decision to forgo performing at the 2017 Coachella Valley Music Arts Festival," the message read.
It comes just weeks after the star revealed she is expecting twins with her husband Jay Z.
There was hope she would be able to appear at Coachella after she performed live at the Grammys earlier this month.
